descriptions:
['DescriptionOne of the very few larger studios available in Club Vista Mare. These units are unique and very sought after. Tastefully furnished  this studio apartment is located directly on  the beach with sea views and views of the Burj Al Arab. Perfect investment opportunity or as a lock and go holiday retreat.
	 * Fully furnished
	 * Fully fitted kitchen 
	 * Large Terrace overlooking the sea
	 * Spacious Lounge
	 * Large Entertaining Terrace
	 * Modern Bathroom
	 * Own private car park space
	 * Ample Restaurants
	 * Only beach front studio on the Palm
Club Vista Mare, a new beachfront residential and recreation project on Dubais Palm Jumeirah.  The project includes 33 studio apartments with eight cafes and restaurants, retail areas and gymnasium facilities, all with spectacular views of Palm Jumeirahs eastern shoreline and Dubais world-famous landmarks.
The contemporary-style Club Vista Mare complex will span almost 5000 sq.m. at ground level, with an additional 2740 sq.m of residential space on the first floor.  Each studio covers almost 50 sq.m and comes with its own private terrace with panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, Palm Jumeirah and Dubais skyline. It is unique in its design, yet will naturally blend in with and complement the islands existing developments.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionDesigned in a contemporary style with an extra special touch of sophistication, this beach front house is surrounded by tranquillity and calm waters on The Palm.\nKnight Frank is proud to offer this stunning five bedroom  Palm Jumeirah urban beach house exclusively to the market. Built and designed by a leading Dutch architect, the property offers cutting edge technology and a “no expense” spared” approach to luxury and personal comfort, all expertly adapted for lavish entertaining and flexible modern living. Situated at the ends of the frond with breath taking views of the iconic skyline of Dubai, the fixtures and fittings in this magnificent villa have been meticulously handpicked and imported from all over the words. The marble flooring throughout the villa is the highest grade Navona travertine from Italy, all external wood shutters and fixtures are the finest teak, the internal doors are solid oak, the bathrooms are all Dornbracht and Agape, the chef’s kitchen custom made by Bulthaup is equipped with Gaggenau appliances, and the entire house has been insulated using the latest BASF technology. The villa has been built up to 9,000 sq feet and the plot extended to 14,925 sq feet.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionFidu Properties is excited to offer you this modish, two-story mid-terraced villa with a bewitching lake view that is guaranteed to add life to your life.
• Brand New
• Vacant 
• Full lake view
• 4 Bedrooms
• 6 Bathrooms that include 2 en suites
• 3,631 Sq. Ft. Layout
• 2,131 Sq. Ft.Land Parcel 
• Kitchen (Closed-Style)
• Maid's Room
• Living Room
• Entrance Hall
• Laundry Room
• Walk-In Closet
• A Wide Balcony
• A Community Swimming 
• Private Garage (2 spaces)
On the ground floor, you will find a large spacious family living/dining area with large glass windows looking out the back of the property overlooking the lake. There is also a closed kitchen which included all appliances, guest toilets, and an external maids room.
The first floor comprises of the master bedroom with the full lake view, balcony, en-suite and fitted wardrobes. There is also 3 other double bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes - one of which has an en-suite and the other two share the family bathroom.
Up on the second floor, there is a study/games/family area and also the door leading out to the rooftop terrace which overlooks the community and lake area.
Close to the Nearby;
• School
• Supermarket
• Community Retail Center
• Restaurants
• Bars
About Jumeirah Island:
Jumeirah Islands is a development of villas within man-made islands spread across 300 hectares. The islands are separated into forty-six clusters. There are sixteen individually styled villas in each cluster. These homes are surrounded by artificial lakes which are an integral part of the Jumeirah Islands community which has a land to water ratio of around two to one, the highest in the world.   The development comprises a total of 736 luxury properties with around four or five bedrooms."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionEmphasizing the New York art deco style of the 1920s, the new Vida Residences Downtown provides a twist on a typical contemporary style, unfound in other off-plan developments in the Downtown Dubai area. With its avant-garde edge, the development will host up to 320 units, including one, two, three, and four-bedroom serviced apartments. Finished with an artistic flair, the apartments will offer a unique personality, blending both modern and vintage aesthetics. These trend-setting residences will be directly linked to the Vida Downtown Hotel through an air-conditioned glass travellator, allowing residents access to top-class hotel amenities. Brimming with promise, these stylish apartments offer a swimming pool, fitness center, and a dedicated area for children set within the three-storey podium.  The development is located on the buzzing Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard which hosts high-end retail shops, classy restaurants, and chic cafes.
 Vida Residence Pent House leaves all the real estate properties behind in sense of layout, view, design, and furnishing. It consists of 5 commendable, spacious. perfectly designed with high-quality furniture and amazing interior all with en-suite bathrooms finishes with outclass marble give it an immense look.  Full 360 degrees Burj Khalifa, Sea view and whole Dubai view from your naked eye is cherry on the top.
This Penthouse has an exclusive entrance with a huge living area and two bedrooms on that flor along with a maid room and three bedrooms on top all with luxury and branded furnished. Burj Khalifa and fountain view from every room.
Vida provides you every luxurious facility you can desire for within the building like an amazing pool to get relax, you cannot compromise on your fitness while living in this outclass building so you have equipped gym.
Dubai Mall is very near to shopping. Designated Parking.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxhabitat is privileged to exclusively offer what can only be described as the new benchmark of luxury living in Dubai. This stunning three bedroom Type B apartment is located in the exclusive BULGARI Resort and Residences on the exquisite island of Jumeirah Bay.
The stunning apartment offers open plan high-quality contemporary living with a built-up area in excess of 2627 square feet. The apartment is immersed in natural light due to the floor to ceiling windows, affording supreme views of the Downtown skyline and the sea. The rooms are very spacious and have ample wardrobes for storage around the apartment.
The unit is located in building 2. Facilities such as a well-equipped gymnasium, squash court, massage room, and sauna are served by personal trainers from the hotel. The development comprises of limited 173 luxury apartments, 8 penthouses, and 15 Mansions, creating a unique and exclusive enclave of stunning apartments and homes, located minutes from Downtown Dubai.
In addition to each property, immaculate finishes and designs the residence will have the pleasure of strolling through manicured landscaped grounds and take advantage of the communal pools, sporting facilities and the unmatched services of The BULGARI Resort. 
For further details on this great apartment please contact Luxhabitat.']

The Hills is an elegantly designed community, featuring low-rise apartments that overlook the rolling greens of the Emirates Golf Club.
The one, two, and three-bedroom homes in The Hills are set in two buildings of 12 and 15 stories, and offer easy access from Sheikh Zayed Road, the main thoroughfare.
Defined by world-class amenities, The Hills offers residents a leisurely way of life in the heart of the city while the close proximity to the new Vida hotel adds further to the lifestyle facilities available.
